relevant_findings.HEENT: Sclerae anicteric, MMM, oropharynx clear, EOMI, PERRL.
relevant_findings.CV: Regular rate and rhythm. Normal S1+S2, no murmurs, rubs, gallops.
relevant_findings.Abdomen: Well healed surgical scars. Soft, non-tender, slightly distended, bowel sounds present, no organomegaly, no rebound or guarding
relevant_findings.Ext: Warm, well perfused, 2+ pulses, no clubbing, cyanosis or edema

physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Pain controlled with IV dilaudid but persists between doses. Overall pain improved, patient feels hungry.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Reported improvement in overall pain control.
